metadata.name: Legend #1
metadata.description: The Festival Family Founder's Pass is a collection of 10,000 Lifetime Founder NFTs providing the highest level of access to the festivalPass ecosystem. Holders receive $1,200 worth of credits annually that provide feeless access to over 80,000 live events in the US and over 600,000 hotel stays worldwide. ATTENTION: Festival Family NFTs have a credit balance that resets once each year on the date it was minted. Remaining credit balances and renewal dates are displayed in the item's metadata, but the most up to date balance information can be found using our Credit Checker Tool here: https://mint.festivalpass.com/credits
